meanings.definition: A large warship equipped to engage in battle.
meanings.sent1: The battleship sailed bravely into the stormy sea.
meanings.sent2: The navy deployed a powerful battleship to protect the coast.
meanings.sent3: The battleship's crew had a picnic on the deck during the calm weather.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a battleship in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The battleship's cannons roared as it fired at the enemy ship.

meanings.definition: A game played on a grid in which players try to sink each other's ships by calling out coordinates.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, they played battleship and had a lot of fun.
meanings.sent2: In battleship, you need strategy to outsmart your opponent and win.
meanings.sent3: The battleship game ended in laughter as Dad accidentally sank his own ship.
meanings.sent4: Her guesses in battleship were as accurate as a skilled archer's aim.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room was palpable as the battleship game reached its climax.
